pages.text: $(li)You can craft a Falconry Hood To improve upon one's falconry skill with your $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/bald_eagle)Bald Eagle$(/l).

$(li)The hood can be placed on an eagle's head, and an eagle with be able to be piloted by its owner, like a drone.$(br)$(li)If the eagle flies further than 150 blocks from its owner, it will attempt to return.$(br)$(li)To stop controlling the eagle, the owner can also sneak. The hood can be removed from the eagle with shears.
